sentences.en: A : A slipper? It'seems to me that a slipper has nothing to do with encouragement.
sentences.cn: 一只拖鞋? 拖鞋和鼓励之间能有什么关系?

sentences.en: A soft leather slipper traditionally worn by native Americans.
sentences.cn: 印第安软皮鞋一种传统上由美洲土著穿的软皮便鞋.

sentences.en: As far as possible need not public tub, towel, slipper.
sentences.cn: 尽量不用公用的浴盆 、 毛巾 、 拖鞋等.

sentences.en: B: A slipper. He tried to encourage himself with the only slipper.
sentences.cn: 一只拖鞋. 他试着用仅有的一只拖鞋鼓励他自己.

sentences.en: Cinderella : You see, I have the other slipper.
sentences.cn: 你看, 我有另一只拖鞋.

sentences.en: Cinderella: And You see, I have the other slipper.
sentences.cn: 灰姑娘: (灰姑娘穿上鞋)而且你看, 我有另一只鞋.

sentences.en: Examples of satin weave fabrics include antique satin, slipper satin, crepe - back satin, bridal satin and moleskin.
sentences.cn: 缎纹织物包括:仿古缎 、 鞋面花缎 、 绉缎 、 婚服缎、充鼹鼠皮等.

sentences.en: Gets in the home to exchange the slipper, let tired one day - long shoes also ventilate.
sentences.cn: 回到家中要换上拖鞋, 让“累”了一天的鞋也透透气.

sentences.en: I rescued the remains of my slipper from the dog.
sentences.cn: 我从那狗的口中夺回了我拖鞋的残留部分.

sentences.en: K ing Say you � � ll marry the girl who fits this slipper.
sentences.cn: 国王你和能穿上这只鞋的女孩结婚怎么样?

sentences.en: My foot was rather sore, but I managed to ease it into a large slipper.
sentences.cn: 我的脚很疼，不过我很小心地把它伸进一只大拖鞋里。

sentences.en: No slipper is allowed in the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 不应在实验室穿著拖鞋.

sentences.en: Stepmother: The glass slipper is their only clue.
sentences.cn: 继母: 那个玻璃鞋是他们唯一的线索.

sentences.en: The boy ran away with the big slipper though she was begging.
sentences.cn: 那个男孩不管她怎么哀求，还是拿着那只大拖鞋跑开了。

sentences.en: This factory is in the specialized production craft room the slipper factory!
sentences.cn: 本工厂是专业生产工艺室内拖鞋的厂家!

sentences.en: When he reached the door, all he found was one glass slipper.
sentences.cn: 当他来到大门口, 只找到一只玻璃鞋.

sentences.en: You see, I have the other slipper.
sentences.cn: 你看, 我有另一只玻璃鞋.

trans.tran_cn: 拖鞋，（室内）便鞋，（马车的）刹车，[机]滑动部分，滑屐，（小孩的）围兜，放猎狗的猎人
trans.tran_en: a light soft shoe that you wear at home
